Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to create an event portal on your own website using the event API in Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys. This feature will reach general availability on October 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
The new event portal enables you to quickly create a comprehensive hub where customers can access event details, session specifics, and speaker schedules. Customers can register using the event registration form. You can integrate the portal into your existing CMS with a JavaScript code snippet, or you can build your customized portal and registration experience using the Event API.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Create an event portal on your own website using the event API.

Title: Dynamics 365 Customer Insights - Journeys - Create an event portal on your own website using the event API
